38sts row 6 kfb k4 k2tog k4 k2tog k4 kfb row 7 9 11 & 13 purl work short row to shape right thigh as follows row 8 increase kfb twice k4 skpo k2 k2tog k4 kfb twice 20sts short row 1 p8 w+tp row 10 kfb k5 skpo k4 k2tog k5 kfb short row 2 k1 w+tk short row 3 p2 w+tp row 12 increase kfb twice k4 skpo k4 k2tog k4 kfb twice 22sts short row 4 k3 w+tk row 14 increase cast on 2 sts for left front pm in first cast-on stitch for left short row 5 p4 w+tp front seam marker k11 kfb k2 kfb k9 to end of row 26sts short row 6 k5 w+tk row 15 increase cast on 2 sts for right front pm in first cast-on stitch for right short row 7 p6 w+tp front seam marker purl all 28 sts to end of row short row 8 k7 w+tk row 16 k2tog k10 kfb k2 kfb knit to last 2 sts k2tog short row 9 p8 w+tp row 17 19 & 21 purl short row 10 k9 w+tk row 18 increase k12 kfb k2 kfb k12 to end of row - 30sts short row 11 p10 w+tp row 20 increase kfb k12 kfb k2 kfb k12 kfb - 34sts short row 12 k11 w+tk row 22 increase k15 kfb k2 kfb k15 to end of row - 36sts short row 13 p12 w+tp row 23 purl short row 14 k13 w+tk work short row to shape left thigh as follows short row 15 purl 37 sts to end of row short row 1 k8 w+tk work short row to shape back as follows short row 2 p1 w+tp short row 1 k31 w+tk short row 3 k2 w+tk short row 2 p24 w+tp short row 4 p3 w+tp short row 3 k23 w+tk short row 5 k4 w+tk short row 4 p22 w+tp short row 6 p5 w+tp short row 5 k21 w+tk short row 7 k6 w+tk short row 6 p20 w+tp short row 8 p7 w+tp short row 7 knit 29 sts across to the end of row roo page 8 roo page 9 row 24 purl row 28 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog 12sts row 29 knit divide the hind leg stitches from the back as follows row 30 increase cast on 6 sts for right foot outer edge p11 p2tog p5 sts to end of row 25 knit 7 sts turn flip work over so that purl-side faces row 17sts slip the remaining 31 sts onto a stitch holder row 31 increase cast on 6 sts for right foot inner edge
